title: Tunisia’s Consul calls on Rana Mashhood
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP): Consul of the Republic of Tunisia, Ammad Rasheed called on Chairman of the Prime Minister’s Youth Programme (PMYP) Rana Mashhood Ahmed Khan on Wednesday.
The two sides held a productive meeting which discussed various initiatives undertaken by the Prime Minister’s Youth Programme. They explored avenues of cooperation between Pakistan and Tunisia in youth development, said a news release.
During the meeting, Consul Ammad Rasheed expressed his admiration for the Prime Minister’s Youth Programme
initiatives highlighting their significant impact on empowering the youth of Pakistan.
He specifically commended Rana Mashhood Ahmed Khan for his dedicated efforts in spearheading these initiatives to foster socio-economic development and promote youth entrepreneurship across the country.
Rana Mashhood expressed gratitude for the Consul’s appreciation and assured him of the Programme’s commitment to further enhancing bilateral relations with Tunisia.
He emphasized the Programme’s ongoing efforts to create opportunities for the youth, enabling them to contribute effectively to Pakistan’s progress and prosperity.
Tunisia Consul and chairman PMYP reaffirmed their commitment to continue collaboration and mutual support in promoting youth-centric initiatives between both countries.
